attributes.action: Legislate for Her Majesty the Queen to have her own personal theme tune...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ... and for said theme to be The Muppets' 'Ma-na ma-na', and for the theme to be played before and after all public and/or televised appearances by Her Majesty the Queen.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
